testimonials.name: Matias Emanuel Toro
testimonials.testimonial: On that occasion I want to provide that whoever necessary should be received my personal and special recommendation for Damián, who in the last year has been working with me as technical leader. I came to the Neoris in the beginning of 2017; and, immediately we created a team synergy. Damián took on the role of senior developer (TD) with success. He has proven himself to be a lifelong learner, with a willingness to embrace change and do every part of his job with the highest quality standards. He handled all our software corporate needs – from recruiting (technical interviewing) to organize a work team aligned, estimations and direct customer communication. Damián’s efforts and innovation also readied us for launching a highly successful project to Dreyfus Company. He was responsible of that successful team. This, I believe, is one of his greatest accomplishments. I am appreciative for the opportunity to have had Damián as a workmate, I recommend him for any position or career he chooses. Sincerely

testimonials.name: Gabriele Lippi
testimonials.testimonial: Working with Damián I could see both his great technical skills, especially in the backend and C# world, and most importantly his empathy and ability to work with the team. He is smart and always kind with his teammates. Together we delivered the prototype of the app in time and we did it without falling down the pressure of the deadline.

testimonials.role: SR. Developer at San Cristóbal Seguros
testimonials.testimonial: He is an excellent Developer and a perfectionist. He develops easily in the team of work and he is always ready to help.

testimonials.testimonial: I had the pleasure of working with Damian at Grupo Oleum. Damian is a very proactive, responsible and common-sense person. He can tackle jobs under pressure without problems. His help in the team brings human and professional value of great quality.

testimonials.name: Santiago Garabaya
testimonials.testimonial: Damián is very focused on his work, responsible and always willing to help a teammate who needs it. He has a lot of technical and theoretical knowledge, and he is always willing to acquire more.

testimonials.name: Damian Leguina
testimonials.testimonial: Person focused on work and learning, he uses his extensive knowledge to find the optimal solution of problems that arise with the tools at his disposal. With a very remarkable capacity for teamwork, you can trust that you will contribute to the group by generating fluency to everyone's complementary skills.
